thread.title: Alphabet is making three big changes in how it reports earnings on Monday

title: Alphabet is making three big changes in how it reports earnings on Monday
text: Alphabet is making three big changes in how it reports earnings on Monday Jillian D'Onfro Reblog When Alphabet posts its first quarter results on Monday, there will be three changes to its earnings report. The company has made adjustments to how it reports revenue from its Nest unit, how it reports unrealized equity securities, and how it measures ad metrics from third-party sites. When Alphabet GOOGL posts its first quarter results on Monday, investors should be prepared to see three changes to how it reports its earnings.
